mama kale ohuta ohu wenna dipu eka witharayi kiyala kohomada mama pahadili karala denne...bandim kiyana patalunu nul bolaya tiken tika lihagena yana gamane ahamben nawathunu me nimnaya diha ihala ahase indala balanna, walakulak wage sahalluwen piyambaala yanna, thatu labenakan hitiya kale himin himin gewila gihin....
ithin sathya dewal idiripath karannata hamadama sathyaya de soya bala ganna aya nisath, ee aya anukaranaya karana anith ayath wethin da illumak athi nisa ee illuma sapirimen labenne wadi labhayak.

siyaluma wargaye indiya sampradayaka andum paladum, abharana ha wisithuru bhandawalin samanwitha mema wilasithagaraya wiwrutha kirime ulela edina pe.wa. 10.00 sita pa.wa. 8.00 dakwa pawathwena athara, ema awasthawata paramparika indiya wilasithawalata ladi oonama ayekuta sahabhagiwime awasthawa himiwe.
malli kiyuwa hari, ape rate boho aayathanawala sewakayange mama oya adupaduwa dakinawa, boho aya kathakaranne hariyata wachana walatath salli gewanawa wage.
ee wagema widesha ratawalin genwana siyalu bhanda apa ratata awashya nathi bawada therumgatha yuthuya.

paribhogika katayuthu pilibanda adhikariya yanuparibhogikayange ayithin aaraksha kirima ha sadharana welandapola tharangakarithwayaathikirima wenuwen shri lankawa thula kriyathmaka wana pradhanathama aayathana athurinekaki.
namuth ee sandaha gathawana kalaya bohoma dirgha ekak wiyahakiyi.

niyojya amathya lasantha alagiyawanna paramparika karmantha aaraksha kirime wadapiliwelak dunu widime kridakayin 4 denekuta waram aasiya chalenj pirimi wolibol tharagawaliye nila lanchanaya prakashayata path kere letn kusalana boksin tharagawaliye tharaga rasak ada dinayeth wayaskanda pihinum tharagawaliye balaka shurathawa maradana santha josap widuhalata waleri lukyanowa bonikkekda?

minissunta salakanne thirisannuntath antha widihata.
ee unata fon eka dikkaranakota honda hinawak dagena karana wadeth amathaka karala balan inna hati.
mage hithe thiyena ekama sathuta thama me wage pahara chiwaradhariyekge le holawapu eka.
nasayen nithara sotu diyara galima, nithara kiwisum yama pinasa roga lakshana kipayaki.
ee wagema chithrapataya baluwa ho natha wiwechanaya kala ayath hitiya.
me aanduwa kinam namakin handunnuwa da eya mulika washayen ranilge aanduwen karanna siti sinhala bauddha wirodhi kriya nathara karana aanduwak.

eth siddhiya ekayi.
dan thamayi angata le tikak inuwe..
yana enno ehi patakayo ya.
